publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3851 Patricia Ferguson: The Other G20—That the Parliament notes the arrival in the United Kingdom of the world leaders who are attending the G20 summit to discuss financial regulation and the ways in which they might boost their countries’ economies in time of recession; congratulates all the partners who are working to regenerate the Maryhill area of Glasgow bearing the G20 postcode, and looks to the Scottish Government to boost the economy of Maryhill through the Town Centre Regeneration Fund. Supported by: Des McNulty*, Jackie Baillie*, Trish Godman*, James Kelly*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Paul Martin*, Bill Butler*, Bob Doris*
S3M-3851 The Other G20 (lodged on 1 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Hugh Henry*, Mary Mulligan*

S3M-3851 Patricia Ferguson: The Other G20—That the Parliament notes the arrival in the United Kingdom of the world leaders who are attending the G20 summit to discuss financial regulation and the ways in which they might boost their countries’ economies in time of recession; congratulates all the partners who are working to regenerate the Maryhill area of Glasgow bearing the G20 postcode, and looks to the Scottish Government to boost the economy of Maryhill through the Town Centre Regeneration Fund. Supported by: Des McNulty, Jackie Baillie, Trish Godman, James Kelly, Mr Frank McAveety, Paul Martin, Bill Butler, Bob Doris, Jamie Hepburn, Hugh Henry, Mary Mulligan
S3M-3851 The Other G20 (lodged on 1 April 2009) Karen Whitefield*
